hero.title: Create Job Application
hero.lead: This tool helps you write a job application in your own language and translate it into the target country’s language. Everything stays in your browser — nothing is stored or shared. Write confidently, but avoid personal information such as your personal identity number or address.

step1.title: Step 1 — Job Details
step1.muted: Fill in at least one field. The more you fill in, the better results in the draft.

step2.title: Step 2 — Tell About Yourself
step2.muted: Tip: 2-3 sentences per box is often a good length. You can see the character count and screen readers are notified of changes.

placeholder.jobTitle: Add the name of the job you are looking for
placeholder.jobUrl: Website of the company you are applying to
placeholder.about: Briefly describe your background and strengths
placeholder.proof: Tell about a concrete achievement and its impact

help.send: "Send" opens your email client with a pre-filled message. Nothing is sent to the server.

privacy.label: Privacy mode
privacy.help: In privacy mode, nothing is stored persistently in the browser. All data is cleared when you leave the page.

assist.tip: Add one concrete example: "How did this show in results?"

about.title: About this tool
body: This is an AI‑assisted writing tool for job applications.
You write in your language and can translate into a target language.
You are responsible for checking and editing the text before use.

ai.title: AI disclaimer
body: Generated content may contain errors, outdated information or unintended bias.
Always review, correct and adapt the output to your situation.
Do not present AI‑generated text as factual without verification.

privacy.title: Privacy
body: Nothing is sent to the server. Data stays in your browser unless you download a file.
Avoid entering personal or sensitive information (e.g., personal identity numbers, full address, health or financial details).
A temporary local session (key ‘jobs-ui’) may be stored unless Privacy mode is on.

terms.title: Terms of Use
body: By using this tool, you agree to use it responsibly and in accordance with applicable laws.
You retain full responsibility for the content you write and submit elsewhere.
We provide no warranty; the tool is offered "as is" without guarantees of accuracy or fitness for a particular purpose.
